fish_color_tip: Pick up items that are equal or higher Rarity.
relic_tip: Pick up Ancient Relics. (Ignores Minimum Rarity)
event_tip: Pick up event items. (Ignores Minimum Rarity) [You can add new even items by putting a cropped .bmp or .png to res/event]
trash_tip: Do you want to pick up trash? Are you sure? (Will loot white rarity items with quantity)
worker_tip: Will feed workers every 90 minutes. Make sure to have beer in the inventory.
rarity_tip: Pick up items that are equal or higher Rarity.
relic_reserve: Enable reserving slots for relics, slots to reserve (if enabled):
dry_tip: Will dry fish when inventory is almost full. Empty Slots will be automatically evaluated after.
dry_max_rarity: Maxmum rarity to use for drying.
discard_tip: Discards disposable fishingrods. (Those that can't be repaired)
